description: Collects statistical metrics from Couchbase server nodes.

paramSchema.title: Couchbase Username
paramSchema.name: useranme
paramSchema.description: The administrative username to access the Couchbase server (default: 'admin').

paramSchema.title: Couchbase Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: The administrative password to access the Couchbase server (default: '').

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the data.  It will default to the hostname of the server

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to poll the Couchbase node for metrics (default: 2000).

paramSchema.title: Advanced Metrics
paramSchema.name: advanced_metrics
paramSchema.description: Produce more detailed metrics (more expensive to compile, default: true).
